about_the_game:
Magical Kingdoms Hegemony "is an absolutely free national war strategy game where you can lead the army, participate in national missions, attack local areas, or defend your own city, lead the country towards prosperity, or serve as a military commander, strategize, and win thousands of miles.

The two armies are at daggers drawn, and the war between ten thousand soldiers is imminent!

Nine real national fiefdoms and more than twenty feudal fiefdoms, each of which will have their own exclusive fiefdom!

Real time battlefield strategy
A completely real-time battlefield strategy, arranging generals to line up, determining the changes in the situation, seizing the opportunity, and setting the world with one hammer, restoring the brave general style of "meeting on a narrow path and winning".

Real time national war duel
Completely real-time national battles, engaging in business and grain transportation, deploying troops and generals, using the world as the chessboard and famous generals as sharp blades, invincible siege and fortress extraction, restoring the king's style of "strengthening the long strategy and governing the world, and strengthening the sea".

Fair competition for hegemony
The competition between pure strategy and operation, even zero krypton can make a big difference. Is it a set of combo moves that instantly defeat opponents, or is it just a matter of your actions to control the situation through seeing and breaking moves. Combination+combination+strategy=one's own Five Tigers General!
detailed_description:
join us

We don't have twitter, Facebook and other platforms for the time being. We mainly interact and discuss with fans through the community center. At the same time, we will also pay attention to the messages on various locations on Steam, and actively provide displays for each location.


About the Game

Magical Kingdoms Hegemony "is an absolutely free national war strategy game where you can lead the army, participate in national missions, attack local areas, or defend your own city, lead the country towards prosperity, or serve as a military commander, strategize, and win thousands of miles. The two armies are at daggers drawn, and the war between ten thousand soldiers is imminent! Nine real national fiefdoms and more than twenty feudal fiefdoms, each of which will have their own exclusive fiefdom! Real time battlefield strategy A completely real-time battlefield strategy, arranging generals to line up, determining the changes in the situation, seizing the opportunity, and setting the world with one hammer, restoring the brave general style of "meeting on a narrow path and winning". Real time national war duel Completely real-time national battles, engaging in business and grain transportation, deploying troops and generals, using the world as the chessboard and famous generals as sharp blades, invincible siege and fortress extraction, restoring the king's style of "strengthening the long strategy and governing the world, and strengthening the sea". Fair competition for hegemony The competition between pure strategy and operation, even zero krypton can make a big difference. Is it a set of combo moves that instantly defeat opponents, or is it just a matter of your actions to control the situation through seeing and breaking moves. Combination+combination+strategy=one's own Five Tigers General!
name: 神奇三国 Kingdoms Hegemony

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: win7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core-i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated/independent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: soundblaster
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: win10
  • Processor: Intel Core-i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated/independent
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: soundblaster

short_description: Reinterpreted a passionate and turbulent world of the Three Kingdoms!
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
